name.baseName: Hollow capsule ; Gelatin ; Sol - dipping - drying ; All sizes; NESPS2
空心胶囊 ; 明胶 ; 溶胶-蘸胶-干燥 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集描述了涉及明胶溶液制备、蘸胶和干燥过程的空心明胶胶囊生产过程。 该过程适用于所有大小变化的空心胶囊。 所述末端管控技术详细说明了污染控制技术。 即它们涉及废水中化学需氧量（COD）和氨氮（NH3-N）的减少。 这些技术包括物理处理、好氧生物处理和厌氧水解与好氧生物处理相结合的方法，每种方法均具有指定的效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码27,四级代码2780文件，在完整版文件中第3258页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为明胶，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAnaerobic hydrolysis + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是厌氧水解+好氧生物处理，其效率为97，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是好氧生物处理，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management40，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理法，其效率为40，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAnaerobic hydrolysis + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是厌氧水解+好氧生物处理，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是好氧生物处理，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是物理法，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量
